document.full_text: on saturday, at brisbane's doomben track, black caviar blitzed a field of top sprinters to record her 13th consecutive win and confirm her timeform rating as the word's best horse.
document.title: the rail: the world's best horse? she's in australia
lines_and_colors: on saturday, at brisbane's doomben track, black caviar blitzed a field of top sprinters to record her 13th consecutive win and confirm her timeform rating as the word's best horse.
